version_description:
We're bringing more love to Jira Server mobile app. In this version we've:
- fixed bugs and made improvements.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.

We're bringing more love to Jira Server mobile app. In this version:
- you can now pre-populate your site URL if you distribute your app via MDM

See http://go.atlassian.com/jira-server-app for more information on how to get your Jira set up to use the app.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.

We're bringing more love to the Jira Server mobile app. In this version, we’ve:
- fixed bugs and made improvements
- added an extra confirmation to make sure you don’t lose your changes when leaving the app’s screen

See http://go.atlassian.com/jira-server-app for more information on how to get your Jira set up to use the app.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.

We're bringing more love to the Jira Server mobile app. In this version, we’ve:
- fixed bugs and made improvements.
- fixed problems with logging in because of missing headers. You no longer need to allowlist the server-info headers on your proxy server, as we’ve introduced an improved server-info flow.

See http://go.atlassian.com/jira-server-app for more information on how to get your Jira set up to use the app.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.

We're bringing more love to the Jira Server mobile app. In this version, we’ve:
- fixed bugs and made improvements.
- fixed problems with logging in because of missing headers. You no longer need to allowlist the server-info headers on your proxy server, as we’ve introduced an improved server-info flow.

See http://go.atlassian.com/jira-server-app for more information on how to get your Jira set up to use the app.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.

We're bringing more love to the Jira Server mobile app. In this version, we’ve:

added a new parameter (skipInfo) to the MDM configuration that solves the problem of proxy servers blocking unauthenticated requests.

fixed bugs and made improvements


See http://go.atlassian.com/jira-server-app for more information on how to get your Jira set up to use the app.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.

We're bringing more love to the Jira Server mobile app. In this version, we’ve:
- Fixed problems with session timeout caused by missing cookies on Data Center instances. You should now be able to log in and use the app as before.
- Fixed other bugs and made improvements

See http://go.atlassian.com/jira-server-app for more information on how to get your Jira set up to use the app.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.

We're bringing more love to the Jira Server mobile app. In this version, we’ve:
- Added the following fields to the service requests: Request Type, Request Participants, and Organizations. To try out Jira Service Management, see https://go.atlassian.com/jsm-support.
- Fixed bugs and made improvements

See http://go.atlassian.com/jira-server-app for more information on how to get your Jira set up to use the app.

Want to let us know what you think? Email us at jira-server-mobile@atlassian.com.
